entry.value: if (flowfile = session.get) flowfile.getAttributes.each do |k, v| if k =~ /^grok\.(.+)/ flowfile = session.removeAttribute(flowfile, k) attr = $1 # don't keep any uppercase attrs, as these are the # grok params. if attr =~ /[a-z]+/ flowfile = session.putAttribute(flowfile, "httpd." + attr, v) end end end session.transfer(flowfile, REL_SUCCESS) end

entry.key: Max Data to Receive per Second
